message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.DC

The paper deals with the problem of allocating security resources in cyber-physical systems, which is a core issue in the field of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed approach involves using game theory to model the interaction between the attacker and defender, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and social networks (cs.SI). The paper also considers the physical and topological characteristics of the cyber-physical system, which falls under the category of networked systems (cs.NI) and distributed computing (cs.DC).
